name: Throw 'em all!
description:
Throw 'em all!

Arcade fighting/throwing game with campaign and local multiplayer. Try to beat the final boss, he is insane! More levels, monsters and skills will be in the future if you like the game. Let me know in the comments!

PS: Please, support me and check my other games!

For this game there is a CHEAT CODE for gold (mostly just to support me)! Check the download section.
